entry.title: Scaling Bitcoin conference micro-report
entry.summary: The context discusses the vision of censorship resistance. The individual's vision is to create a strong decentralized system that cannot be closed and can provide an adequate response to governments like EFF or Google. They believe that having a substantial attack surface, but no significant power is the worst fighting strategy. The context also mentions the scenario of "Peter Todd vs 10 cops." The inability to see another option is equivalent to not understanding what Satoshi created. The closing remark indicates that the person believes that the inability to understand their vision is due to stupidity.
